__e: Starbuck, I have brought you a surprise:
Starbuck, I don't want to care about anybody... but especially you.
Starbuck, I got something for you.
Look, if we really want to find out who Starbuck is, we need these guys to help us put together the strategy to make sure that this thing doesn't turn into a circus.
Hiya, Starbuck. ls my father back?
Too bad Starbuck and Apollo aren't here.
Boomer, have Starbuck and Apollo take after that ship and bring it back - immediately, if they can.
What Starbuck and Apollo are about to do is the only chance these people have of surviving.
